boardgame.name: Federation & Empire: Combined Operations – Rulebook 2021 Edition
boardgame.description:
Combined Operations has more rules for Federation & Empire.
It is newly improved and updated, having gone through extensive review and discussion during Stratcon 2021. All rules questions from ADB, Inc.’s BBS and Captain’s Log issues have been addressed to provide the best experience for every empire.

This product includes many new concepts (stasis field generators, electronic warfare, light tactical transports, monitors, special units, and Marines), which enhance play value by providing players with new ways to destroy their enemies. New economic factors include commercial convoys, base stations, and PF storage depots. You can take the fight to the planet with ground combat, including special attack forces. Prime teams can help in combat or aid in capturing a ship, along with other abilities.

And there are scenarios galore!
Koval’s Lightning has Klingons and the Federation facing off;
Thunder over Kzintai has Kzintis, Lyrans, and Klingons;
The Hydran Expedition has Hydrans trying to get to Federation territory without being stopped by the Klingons;
The Wayward Wind explores what would have happened if the Coalition had attacked the Hydrans first, rather than the Kzintis;
Reptilicon Revenged has Romulans and Gorns;
Cold Front can be used as a training scenario with the experienced player commanding the Hydrans and newer players commanding the Coalition;
Tholian Gambit has the Klingons facing the Tholians;
The Late Kingdom explores what would have happened if the Hydrans had to start the General War by reconquering their territory.

You will need the Federation & Empire 2010 Rulebook and various countersheets to use this expansion.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: The Feathered Yard
boardgame.description:
From the description:

Autumn has come. The leaves are falling, the sun is falling, the feathers are falling...?

The chickens of the Happy Bird's Farm have started their molt, and boy is it a rough one this year! Now's the perfect time to snag some warm, soft, and fashionable feathers. Or maybe the piles of fluff would make for good cover for any mice looking to steal an egg or two! But is this molt entirely natural?

The Feathered Yard is an adventure site that comes with a self-contain story, as well as a plethora of poultry themed treasures and spells. You can drop it on your hexmap, run it as a oneshot, or even break it open and steal all the shiny bits!

boardgame.name: The King of Cats
boardgame.description:
From the description:

The King of Cat's crown has been stolen.

Though the cats of the world serve no god (of course), they still pay fealty to the powerful Cat-Sith. Now, his crown has been stolen from its shrine by an unknown thief. If it isn’t found then a powerful artefact will rest in nefarious hands, the guardians of the shrine will be punished, and the King of Cats might just be forced to declare war on canine-kind…

'The King of Cats' is a one-page fantasy adventure designed to be system neutral and compatible with any tabletop RPG, including Heartbreaker.

boardgame.name: Hungry Little Demons
boardgame.description:
Hungry little demons have invaded your neighborhood! They're up to their usual mischief, and it doesn't look like they'll stop until they're fed. The only way to protect your belongings and get them out of your house is to cook them a meal of their choosing. Head into the Shifting Forest to gather the ingredients you need for your culinary countermeasure, but be careful—the forest has a mind of its own.

Hungry Little Demons is a competitive memory game for 2-6 players where you play as both the hero and the villain. You’ll move your chef through the ever-changing layout of the Shifting Forest to look for and gather ingredients for your recipes, collect Demon Bait to protect your furniture, and even meet with some of the helpful Wood Sprites who call the Shifting Forest home. At the same time, you’ll command your demon to destroy furniture, make mischief, and generally just be a nuisance until it’s been fed.

The game ends when a player completes at least one of their recipes and gets their chef back to their house. Points are then scored based on recipes completed, ingredients gathered, furniture destroyed, and demons remaining in your chef’s house. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Feathered Bear
boardgame.description:
From the description:

This is a new background for Troika! Numinous Edition, for a bear crossed with a bird.

boardgame.name: The Backpacking Through Europe Card Game
boardgame.description:
Europe is rich with history, culture, and wonderful people calling to you and your fellow backpackers to see as much as you can. In the Backpacking Through Europe Card Game the traveler who has the most memorable trips, wins!

The Backpacking Through Europe Card Game is a goal-driven hand management game that challenges players to craft carefully considered trips around Europe. On your turn you will decide whether to TRAVEL or PLAN the next stage of your trip.

To TRAVEL, play a single card from your hand matching exactly 1 transportation icon from your most recently played card.

To PLAN, take all cards of a single country from a public pool and add them to your hand.

Each destination a player visits provides them with victory points and bonus points can be earned by fulfilling the conditions of goal cards. Some goals include visiting the most destinations in a certain country, having trips of certain lengths, using specific kinds of transportation, and for making perfect round trip itineraries where your last destination provides transportation back to your first destination.

Goal cards change every game causing players to adapt to ever changing criteria for judging the value of a trip.

The backpacker who earns the most points, wins!

boardgame.name: Alliance
boardgame.description:
A 1-6 player game of diplomacy and warfare in the Napoleonic Era... with a Columbia Block System twist.

Play as Austria, Britain, France, Prussia, Russia, and Spain. These major powers cannot survive alone, however. They require the assistance and support of neighboring countries, the Minor States. The Columbia Block System adds a level of granularity to the traditional style of such games.

Even though Alliance is best with 3-6 players, the Minor States create added depth for the two-player game and solo rules are in the works for the growing demand for solitaire play.

Players start each turn by receiving six cards, and discarding one. Afterwards, they take turns playing a card, moving and building units, and conducting combat operations if necessary. Then a political phase occurs in which the major powers make diplomatic plays for the Minor States.

Players can forge alliances lasting a year or more, with various conditions in effect: gold tributes, border disputes, non-aggression pacts, etc. By default, the winner is the player with the most Victory Points in cities by the game's end. Other scenarios may have extra stipulations that also determine victory.

boardgame.name: ARK - The Center
ARK: Survival Evolved – The Center
boardgame.description: The Center is an official non-canonical (free DLC) expansion map that has a default difficulty level of 5.0 which means wild dinos up to level 150 and better loot quality from supply drops. Prior to January 2017, Giganotosaurus had an extremely rare chance to spawn anywhere on the map; now Giganotosaurus will only spawn in a few areas such as the Lava Biome and Northern Snowy Mountain. The center is based on the novel Journey to the Center of the Earth and the story is your journey to the center of the earth. It originated as a custom map by modder Ben “EvilMrFrank” Burkart. It was added to ARK: Survival Evolved as free DLC in PC patch 241.0 and Xbox One update 734.0. It underwent a "mega-update" that added the Redwood Forests in PC patch 245.0 and was released on Xbox One and PS4.

boardgame.name: Vilitum
boardgame.description:
“Ah, Vilitum! Of my discoveries in the strange land that is Camria, this has been my most treasured! An elegant game of strategy and wit. A game of kings and peasants alike."

Vilitum is an abstract strategy game for 2 players. Each player controls an army of 5 unique units. If you defeat all of your opponent's units, or if they surrender, you win!

On each turn a player may move and/or attack with 1 piece. If a piece receives enough damage, it is removed from the board. Each unit has a unique combination of movement, attack range, and special ability.

For younger players, or for your first game, a simplified rule set gets players use to the basics, and adding in the advance rules opens the DEEP strategy of Vilitum.

Adding in the Soldier Expansion gives each player a new unit. Each player now has a pair of soldiers, that while having the lowest life, are tough, and if they are adjacent, deal extra damage.

boardgame.name: After the Last Sky
boardgame.description:
After the Last Sky simulates the first Palestinian Intifada, from 1987-1993. The game system is a custom implementation of the classic Card Driven Game (CDG) mechanism combined with new mechanisms that simulate civil unrest on a strategic scale. In the game 1-2 players simulate the First Palestinian Intifada. One side is the Unified National Leadership of the Uprising (UNLU) composed of the Palestinian community leadership within the Israeli occupied territories of the Gaza Strip and West Bank. The other side is the conservative Likud-led Israeli government (ISR). Hamas acts as a situationally controllable faction that acts more independently from the UNLU - helping and hindering both factions at different times.

Issuing Operations and exploiting events, players recruit and deploy units to control territory and/or foment uprising. The game is played over 3 rounds composed of hands of cards that are played as actions or events. If, after this time, the Israeli player cannot maintain national will (support for the conservative administration), they will lose the game.

The UNLU’s goals are two-fold: 1) sustain on-board protests and transition them into general strikes, and 2) influence international concern by engaging in non-violent efforts. ISR aims to control the occupied territories by 1) suppressing civil disobedience in map locations, and 2) establishing intelligence networks within the communities to implant operatives or encourage collaboration with the Israeli Defense Force (IDF) in suppressing the civil unrest.

Additionally, automatic victory conditions exist for both sides. The UNLU player may win if international concern sways in their favor; that is, in the form of UN intervention due to human rights abuses. The Israeli player may automatically win if they deploy all of their intelligence networks, effectively snuffing out the resistance at the source.

boardgame.name: Temple of Elemental Evil
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Village of Hommlet thrives again. Years ago, this quaint village nearly fell prey to a great, neighboring evil. The nearby Temple of Elemental Evil, a grand edifice of wickedness, was defeated after a great battle and thrown into ruin forever…or was it?

Bandits have started to ride the roads again, and there are other ominous signs afoot. It is whispered that the demonic evil at the heart of the Temple was not truly conquered but merely imprisoned. Even now, agents of evil, malevolent beasts, and far worse creatures are conspiring to return the Temple to power and enslave the surrounding lands. Hommlet and the neighboring ruins may hold clues, but not everyone is to be trusted. Surely danger lies hidden in this idyllic region.

Sharpen your swords and axes. Purchase your iron rations and tinderboxes. And don’t forget at least one 10-foot pole. Great adventure awaits those that dare confront the Temple of Elemental Evil!

boardgame.name: Ardennes Plus+: Volume One
boardgame.description:
Ardennes Plus is a grand strategic level simulation of 20th century conflicts in the densely forested and rough terrain of the Ardennes region of France, Luxembourg and Belgium. This game features scenarios have been created for the Battle of the Bulge WWII December 1944.

The game uses Army level command structures to simulate supply and command in divisional and corps level units. The game optionally represents the fog of war that was very common in the rough country of the Ardennes, by offering 2 hidden movement systems.

The low counter density, and high map scale is used to create conditions for fast play and resolution is possible in less than 2 hours. Event card options are also incldued to add historical flavour to this classic battle, based on the geopolitic and technical events that occured at the time.

The game can be played solo, as a two player game, with one player commanding the Allied forces, and one the German forces, or as a three player game, with two players playing the Allied forces (one playing Commonwealth forces and one playing USA forces), and the third player commanding the German forces.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: History: World War II (Battle of the Bulge)

boardgame.name: Time Vs. Ninja: Series Three
boardgame.description:
Time-Traveling Ninja jump through history, hunting for rare artifacts, meeting unusual companions, exploring hostile lands and engaging in Ninja Battle!

This science-fiction adventure game features an array of maps to explore, from Ancient Egypt to a futuristic Lunar Colony. Players choose from one of the Legendary Ninja characters (each with their own Legendary Ninja Ability, then embark on a time-traveling adventure!

Players roll dice to travel through treacherous zones, hop from zone to zone, or acquire item and companion cards. As they collect, their abilities and options grow!

Each character is linked in a row, so any damage one sustains dramatically impacts the other players. Being connected to your enemies can be a real challenge! If a Ninja 'falls off the row', the game ends and the one with those most collected items wins!

Series 3 includes 4 Time-Spaces:
Laurentia 530M BC
Sydney 1776 AD
Chicago 1930 AD
London 4100 AD

Also included are 3 Legendary Ninja:
Kido Yazaemon
Kato Danzo
Jiraiya

boardgame.name: Kingdoms of Akandia
boardgame.description:
MORE INFOS to the story, gameplay, characters and mechanics on our homepage:

www.koa-studios.com

Welcome to Kingdoms of Akandia "The Seven Realms".

The first volume in an extensive, immersive and FULL-cooperative open world. You and your friends are fighting together against the spreading darkness. You choose your group of heroes and have your own adventure over 3 chapters and 35-65 hours of gameplay with 1-4 players.

Some mechanics:


open world "The Seven Realms"
unique puzzle equipment system (UPES)
upgrade abilities
supply chains
soloquests
recruiting garrisons
use mounts
mix of card and dice-fighting system
upgrade tower defense
destiny cards which changes every gameplay
and much more

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Rainbow Friends
boardgame.description:
Way up in Cloudlandia is where the Rainbow Friends live – Kody Koala, Cammy Chameleon, Penny Penguin and Lazy Lou. These four friends create beautiful rainbows together when the sun is shining through the rain.

Valuable cloud crystals can be found where these rainbows touch the ground. Grab them by proving you have a good eye for distance and size.

The first player to collect three golden cloud crystals wins the sparkling collection game!

boardgame.name: Balon Prisionero
boardgame.description:
Grab the ball, choose your target and throw the ball as hard and fast as you can! You have to eliminate or be eliminated!

It is a team sport in which players must eliminate their opponents by hitting them with a ball. The winner is the team that eliminates first 6 of the 10 players of the opposing team.
This board game recreates this renowned and fun sport by using a customized die. This die will be rolled on the Player cards to try to eliminate them and to be victorious!

Ability when you throw the dice and action cards are the key for get de victory!!

Balon Prisionero ("Dodgeball") is a amazing cardgame for 2 players.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Story Colors
boardgame.description:
Roll the dice and make up a story! The player who guesses the hidden colors in it will be the winner.

To be the first player to move completely around the Scoring board. You will move forward by winning victory points telling the best stories, when you are narrator, and guessing the correct color sequence during other´s players stories.

With personalize dice, screens, decision boards, scoring board and cards with the beginning of stories, Story Colors is a funny party boardgame for all family.

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Spirit Island: Finder unsichtbarer Wege
boardgame.description:
The German version of the Finder of Paths Unseen spirit promo for Spirit Island. Pegasus Spiele released the spirits from Spirit Island: Promo Pack 2 seperately.

„Finder unsichtbarer Wege ist den Dahan wohlbekannt: Er durchquert mühelos die Insel und die meisten Geister-Redner haben ihn schon getroffen. Er kommuniziert direkter als andere Geister, indem er seine hohen Triller mit Ebenen von Gedanken überlagert. Manchmal hilft er Seelen gestorbener Dahan auf ihrem Weg, bevor bösartige Geister sie verschlingen können. Obwohl er allgegenwärtig ist, bleibt er rätselhaft. Sogar die Dahan, die ihn den Wegbereiter nennen, sind sich nicht sicher, ob er wirklich neue Wege erschafft oder findet, was bereits da ist. Ist die Parallelwelt, durch die er sich bewegt, überhaupt räumlich oder eine andere Daseinsform? Die Gedanken, die er kommuniziert, sind so fremdartig, dass sie sich nur schwer in Worte fassen lassen.

Finder unsichtbarer Wege ist ein zusätzlicher Geist für Spirit Island mit sehr hoher Komplexität Dieser Geist bewegt die meiste Zeit Invasoren und manchmal Dahan, Präsenzen oder Tiere. Dadurch (und durch reichlich Isolieren) kann er gut invasorenfreie, „sichere“ Zonen schaffen. Ohne eine Möglichkeit vernichtete Präsenzen zurück ins Spiel zu bringen, kann er es sich nur selten leisten, Invasoren zu zerstören. Daher benötigt er eine passende Starke Fähigkeit – oder Mitspieler, die ihn bei Angriffen unterstützen. Da er die Topologie der Insel ändert, steigert sich die Komplexität für alle Spieler – vor allem in größeren Spielen!“

boardgame.name: The Empty Empty Place
boardgame.description:
From the description:

Where do things go when magic sends them away?

The party is about to find out when their Sorcerous rival sends them to a plane of Banishment. No food, no light, no SAFETY! Can the party escape?

boardgame.name: The Protection of Turalia
boardgame.description:
Turalia is a democratic land, where people vote for the government every few years. Now is time to vote for a new president but, in an unfortunate coincidence, a fire has started in the north of the land. Join other candidates to stop the fire. But do not lose sight of the people votes: there can be only one president.

The protection of Turalia is a familiar semi cooperative game for 2 to 4 players. Suggested age is from 10 years and game complexity is low. Each game will take about 30 to 45 minutes. Game materials are a main board, a secondary board, some cardboard tiles and the following components in five colors: wooden cubes, wooden discs and six sided dice.

The game main mechanic is action selection. Players will throw dices and group them by values. A player will select a dice from a group and, for each other dice on that group, the fire will advance. If a city has too much fire, the fire will be out of control in that city. If that happens in too many cities, players will lose the game.

Then, the player will perform some actions and deploy some new units in the south. At the end of the turn, if there are enough units in a city, that city will be fortified. But only one player can fortify the city. Also, fortifying cities will improve all players actions: more movement, more fire extinction, etc. And the player with more cities fortified will win the game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Nirvana
boardgame.description:
Roll dice.
Play cards.
Liberate yourself.

In Nirvana, players first roll dice and sum up the values to create cards for a card game. Whoever gets rid of all their cards first wins!

In more detail, in the roll-and-write half of the game, a player rolls three dice, then all players write the values in a colored area on their board. Each player also has a limited ability to adjust the value of the dice in this round. Once complete, the players sum the columns on their sheet as shown to determine the ranks of the "cards" in their hand.

In the shedding half, the players play a game based on the traditional structure known as Daifugō, with the start player playing one or more cards of the same rank, and the other players then either passing or playing the same number of cards but of a higher rank. The first player to "play" all of their "cards" wins!

This re-implementation of ロールライト⚅富豪 (Roll Write Daifugō) has an all-new design and a card expansion that changes the rules each time you play.
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: ロールライト ⚅富豪 (Roll Write Daifugō)

boardgame.name: Kids & Legends
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:
Apri la scatola e gioca! Kids & Legends è un gioco di ruolo utilizzabile in famiglia, a scuola o con gli amici. Un sistema completo per ragazze e ragazzi (ma anche adulti) che non hanno mai visto un gioco di ruolo.

English translation:
Open the box and play! Kids & Legends is a role-playing game for family, school or friends. A complete system for girls and boys (but also adults) who have never seen an RPG. No manual to study, the rules are learned while playing.

boardgame.name: 서스펙트 게임 (Suspect Game)
boardgame.description: Stories are always dubious around these incidents. Resentment, infatuation, money, ambition—whatever the motivation. Fortune has brought all of you upon this murder case. With everyone professing innocence, it is clear that you cannot have faith in each story. And so to escape your circumstance, you must not be victimized. Perhaps time is better spent divulging the weakness of others. Doesn’t everyone have a secret? Like murder.

boardgame.name: Mysterious Ladder New Journey to the West
신묘한 사다리 (Mysterious Ladder)
boardgame.description:
Race to the Gold Coconut!
On a bountiful and rugged mountain live the descendants of the Monkey King. These monkeys are now looking for new leadership. It all began with the rumor of a golden coconut at the mountain peak. Excited, the monkeys decided that the one to claim this coconut would become the leader. The first player to reach the top receives the Gold Coconut and wins.

Players roll a die and move up the levels of the pyramid -- unless they hit a space with a slide which sends them back to the previous level.

A 3D Snakes & Ladders type of game.

boardgame.name: City Chase
boardgame.description:
Calling all units! A serious theft has occurred!
The thief is hiding in one of the buildings. Police helicopters are patrolling between buildings to track and stop the escape. Will the police arrest the thief, or will the thief escape?

In more detail, at the start of the game the board is set up with 25 3D buildings that can be lifted to put the thief's car under. In the thief's turn all police players must close their eyes while the thief moves their car to under an adjacent building. Then in the police turn they open their eyes and can perform 1 of 2 possible actions each: move or search. While moving the helicopter moves to an adjacent crossing. While searching the helicopter may look under an adjacent building.

The police players collectively win if they find the thief within the 11 rounds. The thief wins if they stay hidden for 11 rounds.

boardgame.name: Tanto Cuore: 10th Anniversary Setup Playmat
boardgame.description: As part of the 10th Anniversary kickstarter, they created a neoprene Oversized Ultimate Setup Playmat with setup locations for card types from all 5 games.

boardgame.name: Tanto Cuore: Five Themed Playmats
boardgame.description: As part of the 10th Anniversary Kickstarter, they created neoprene individual player playmats themed after the five Tanto games.

boardgame.name: Adventurers! Dungeon - Special Edition
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:
Dungeon porta il regolamento di Adventurers! alle vere origini del gioco di ruolo: l’esplorazione dei dungeon!
Un regolamento semplice ed immediato creato per coloro che vogliono avventurarsi in antiche rovine piene di mostri e tesori.

English translation:
Dungeon brings the Adventurers! rules to the true origins of roleplaying: the exploration of dungeons!
A simple and immediate system created for those who want to venture into ancient ruins full of monsters and treasures.

boardgame.name: The Singing Sands
boardgame.description:
A flash of colour and the crackle of lightning are the last things you remember before dust clouded your vision. You clamber to your feet and survey your surroundings. Sand as far as you can see, and an eerie song on the wind. Wherever you came from doesn't matter now. All that matters if you're here, you are low on supplies and the air is getting hotter as the minutes pass. It's time to move.

The Singing Sands is a rules-lite RPG for solo play and worldbuilding. It contains all the rules for a single player to enter the desert and begin their journey alongside oracle tables to help set the scene around you.

To play you will keep a journal of your encounters, building the world from the eyes of your character. Your character skills and keywords will influence the Dice Pool which is used to check the success of failure of your actions.

Use the blank Hex map to track your journey and build your own desert or use the prebuilt map for the Mirrored Tower adventure.

Description taken from game webpage(https://marccook.itch.io/singingsands)

boardgame.name: Gay Sauna the Board Game
boardgame.description:
Gay Sauna the Board Game is a fun fast paced tabletop roleplaying game where you play the role of a horny visitor playing a hookup contest against your fellow players.

Players adventure through the sauna visiting exciting cruising areas including the Dry Sauna, Steam Room, Cabins and the mysterious Dark Room.

Armed with a handful of tactical Action Cards to give you the edge over the competition or drop them to their knees, players need to find their matches and pounce to catch the boys before closing time while enduring an onslaught of hilarious and disgusting random events.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Tagiron: Mini Expansion
boardgame.description: As part of the 10th anniversary of the board game cafe Jelly Jelly, the store released this mini expansion for Tagiron. The expansion consists of 5 new question cards (such as "How many prime numbers do you have?") and two 10 tiles, one each in blue and red.

boardgame.name: Cat-Astrophe
boardgame.description:
Have stacks of fun with purrrfect kitties to stack as high as you can. Will you be able to balance them all or will the game end in cat-astrophe?

Challenge yourself or take it in turns with friends to stack those kitties. Make sure to stay pawsitive and keep a steady hand. Be warned, if you make the stack tumble, you're meeeeowt!

boardgame.name: MicroMacro: Crime City – Full House: Another Bank Robbery
MicroMacro: Crime City – Full House: Encore un braquage
MicroMacro: Crime City – Full House: Noch ein Bankraub
boardgame.description: An exclusive, kid friendly bonus case for MicroMacro: Crime City - Full House. Was bundled with preorders of MicroMacro: Crime City - Full House by German distributor Pegasus Spiele GmbH in August 2021.

listing.notes:
[b]All prices are inclusive of UK and EU VAT, but do not include shipping costs.[/b]
[size=14][b]Flat Rate Shipping:[/b][/size]
The shipping cost is the same regardless of the number of items ordered: 2 Euros within Germany. 3 Euros to Albania, Australia, Belarus, Brazil, Canada, China, Faroe Islands, Greenland, Iceland, Indonesia, Israel, Japan, Liechtenstein, Malaysia, New Zealand, Norway, Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, and the USA. 4 Euros to Austria, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Czech Republic, Cyprus, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxemburg, Macedonia, Malta, Mexico, Moldavia, Monaco, Montenegro, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Ukraine, United Kingdom, and Vietnam. 5 Euros to Bulgaria, Croatia, Denmark, Hungary, Romania, and Sweden. 6 Euros to all other countries.
NOTE: The shipping rates for deliveries outside of the EU and UK have been discounted to make up for the fact that no VAT is paid for sales outside of the EU and UK. However, there may be import taxes for deliveries outside of the EU and UK, and the buyer is responsible paying these.
[size=14][b]Payment Options:[/b][/size]
[size=12][b]Paypal:[/b][/size] No fee is charged to you, if you pay using Paypal. But Paypal does not change currency at the fair market rate. So you will lose 3% or more of your money, if you are converting to Euros.
[size=12][b]IBAN Bank Transfer:[/b][/size] Payment by bank transfer is possible using an IBAN compatible account. [b]There is a 3% discount if you pay using IBAN Bank Transfer[/b] (i.e., your total payment due is 3% less).
[size=12][b]Wise:[/b][/size] There is a 3% discount if you pay using Wise (i.e., your total payment due is 3% less). The company does currency conversion at the fair market rate, and charges the sender a fee of about 0.5% of the amount of money sent.
[size=12][b]Revolut:[/b][/size] There is a 3% discount if you pay using Revolut (i.e., your total payment due is 3% less). The company does currency conversion at the fair market rate, and there are no fees to send money.
[size=12][b]Interac e-transfer:[/b][/size] If you have a Canadian bank account (like me), then you can pay by Interac e-transfer. In this case, you pay in Canadian dollars, at the fair market exchange rate. There is also a 3% discount, if you pay using Interac e-transfer (i.e., your total payment due is 3% less).
[size=12][b]Payment in Dollars:[/b][/size] It is possible to make Paypal payments in US or Canadian dollars, at the fair market exchange rate. You will automatically receive this option, if your address is in the USA or Canada.
[size=14][b]I take responsibility for the safe delivery of your order:[/b][/size] I am a registered commercial seller. Thus, insofar as you are a private consumer, it is required by German law that I take responsibility for any loss or damage of goods that occurs during shipment.
[size=12][b]Looking for something that is not listed here?[/b][/size]
I also sell larger items on BGG here: https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/the_canadian_gamer?pageid=1
If you want to combine items from my other alias, let me know. The flat rate shipping offered here does not apply to the items listed there. The items sold here will typically (but not always) ship for free with the items sold there.
I can also make [size=12][b]special orders[/b][/size] for items that I don't have in stock. Send me a message concerning an item, and I will check for availability and tell you what the price would be.

boardgame.name: Trapped: Mission to Mars
boardgame.description:
Escape Room Game Pack
Series 1, Room 4
Difficulty level: MEDIUM

TRAPPED turns any room into a family-friendly escape-room adventure. Each game is loads of fun as you move around the room actively solving puzzles and decoding clues. Every pack is different and contains everything you need to create your very own escape room experience. Packed with loads of content including clues to solve and puzzles to crack, all you need to add is family or friends to play and the cunning to escape/live the dream!

In Mission to Mars, you and your crew are on a mission to Mars! Approaching the red planet in search of a new Earth, you wake from your cryosleep pod, gasping for air… As the alarm echoes through the ship, your ears adjust to the message… It’s one no astronaut wants to hear: “WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! CRITICAL FAILURE!” A life-threatening system failure means you must now land the ship manually. Check your coordinates. Steady the thrusters. Solve the problems… Can you and your crew save the mission? The fate of humanity is in your hands!

boardgame.name: Trapped: The Zoo
boardgame.description:
Escape Room Game Pack
Series 1, Room 5
Difficulty level: EASY

TRAPPED turns any room into a family-friendly escape-room adventure... Each game is loads of fun as you move around the room actively solving puzzles and decoding clues. Every pack is different and contains everything you need to create your very own escape room experience. Packed with loads of content including clues to solve and puzzles to crack, all you need to add is family or friends to play and the cunning to escape/live the dream!

The Zoo: Find the Meerkats! In The Zoo, it’s the day you’ve been waiting for: your annual trip to the zoo! Excited, you upgrade your ticket to include a Personal Meerkat Experience. Under strict instructions to stay in the enclosure, the zookeeper leaves you to play with the meerkats. But wait! You do need to get your camera...A few seconds outside won’t hurt, surely? When you come back: disaster! The gate is ajar, and all eight meerkats are running into the distance! Now your team has a mission: work together, solve the puzzles and catch the meerkats! The future of the zoo is in your hands.

listing.notes:
Trapped: The Zoo
[b]Edition:[/b] SolidRoots, 2021 [b]Language:[/b] English language [b]Language Dependance:[/b] Medium , Some necessary in-game text
[b]Condition:[/b] Brand New and unplayed.
[b]Other:[/b] Smoke free home

boardgame.name: Trapped: Flight 927
boardgame.description:
Escape Room Game Pack
Series 1, Room 6
Difficulty level: HARD

TRAPPED turns any room into a family-friendly escape-room adventure... Each game is loads of fun as you move around the room actively solving puzzles and decoding clues. Every pack is different and contains everything you need to create your very own escape room experience. Packed with loads of content including clues to solve and puzzles to crack, all you need to add is family or friends to play and the cunning to escape/live the dream!

In Flight 927, the holiday you’ve been waiting for has finally arrived… Excited, you board the plane, looking forward to a week of relaxation. Not long into the flight, though, the plane starts to shudder. Suddenly, you’re losing altitude! Your stomach lunges as the plane plunges. Over the tannoy the pilot shouts, “Brace for impact!” Panicked, you adopt the brace position – and then… Darkness! As you regain consciousness, you open your eyes and realise the plane is down! Now it’s up to you to call for rescue. Can you get into the cockpit, send out a distress signal – and save the day?

boardgame.name: Twlight of Doom
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Journey To Ragnarok is an adventure and setting module for characters of level 1st to 15th, inspired by Norse myths and legends, compatible with 5th Edition.

It is a captivating adventure that will lead the Heroes from Midgardr through the Nine Worlds.

In an epic journey, the fate of men will be tied to that of the gods, until the final moment, the Ragnarok.

This book includes:

a fantastic multi-table adventure to play all together
tips for Masters and players
maps illustrations and stats for your adventure

boardgame.name: Southlands Player's Guide for 5th Edition
boardgame.description:
Bold Heroes From the Lands of Pitiless Sun!

Over the crest of the dune they came, more than two dozen gnolls running fast; our sandship was ready for them—until their aeromancer turned the wind itself against us!

This book provides a treasure trove of character options, including dozen playable races and variants for the 5th edition of the world’s first RPG including: catfolk, gnolls, jinnborn, lizardfolk, minotaurs, trollkin, and many more.

These new options include all-new backgrounds as well, such as the Desert Runner, the Siwali Embalmer, and the Servant of the Jinn. Uncover new Southlands subclasses that fit your character, such as:

Circle of the Desert druid archetype
Aeromancer wizard arcane traditions
Oath of the Ancestors for paladins
Caravan raider rogue archetype
And many others!

Plus new spells, hieroglyphs and lotus blossoms, weapons, armor, and more! The Southlands Player’s Guide adds layers of enchantment to any game!

As the official companion volume to the Southlands Worldbook for 5E, this book is the definitive source for players who want to bring their Southlands characters to life!
boardgame.rpgseries: Southlands: Adventures Beneath the Pitiless Sun

boardgame.name: くくまる (Kukumaru)
boardgame.description:
くくまる (Kukumaru) is a game where players aim to get 6 of their discs in a row. The discs are hollow cardboard rings that are red on one side and blue on the other.

The game has two modes: a "reflexes" real-time game and a "thinking" game. In both, players use a deck of number cards to generate multiplication products that determines where the player puts a disc in a 6x6 grid of numbers.

In both games, the first player to get 6 in a row wins; if neither player achieves this when the cards run out, the player with more of their discs on the board wins.

The game includes a few variants, including one that adds Othello/Reversi rules.

boardgame.name: Enchanters: Darklands
boardgame.description:
A New expansion for the Enchanters card game.
Forge Enchanted items to defeat foes and gain Glory points! You win if you have the most Glory points when the game ends!

boardgame.name: Flee the Dungeon!
boardgame.description:
Three brave heroes have been kidnapped by a wicked sorcerer and imprisoned inside a dungeon! To escape, they must recover their lost items, locate the dungeon key, and reach the exit—all while avoiding the dangers that lurk within the dungeon corridors. But beware the Sorcerer, whose arsenal of ferocious monsters, deadly traps, and powerful spells threaten to halt the heroes’ escape and entomb them in the dungeon forever...

Flee the Dungeon! is a fast-paced 3-on-1 tile placement game that’s easy to learn and highly replayable. Assuming the roles of the captured heroes, three players take turns placing dungeon tiles in hopes of locating their lost items and making their escape. The fourth player assumes the role of the Sorcerer, who wields an array of monsters and magical spells that can be used to stop the heroes from reaching safety. The gameplay makes use of resource management and light "press your luck" mechanics, giving players a wealth of strategies to explore with each playthrough. Each game plays in 60 minutes or less.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Genshin Tarot: The Genshin Impact Board Game
boardgame.description:
"Step inside weary Traveler, you look like you're in need of a break. Why don't you join me for a quick game?"

Genshin Tarot is a 60 minute simultaneous turn 2 to 4 player co-op card strategy board game.

Each player creates a party of 4 Genshin Characters, dealt randomly from a pool of 22 playable characters (with 14 more added with the first expansion.) Each character brings several cards unique to them to your deck, forming a totally distinct deck for each player.

Each round is split into player and enemy phase. Play happens simultaneously during the player phase, where each player will use the cards in their hands to take down the waves of enemies in front of them or offer help to allies. On the enemy phase, surviving monsters will attack players, and enemy ranks will be replenished.

Once any one player defeats all of the enemies in front of them, they trigger the arrival of the boss. The players win if the boss is defeated, but lose if any player ever hits 0 HP.

Will you and your friends take command of your own fate? Or falter in the face of Teyvat's challenges.

boardgame.name: Beneath Bernhold
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Fantasy Adventure for Players Levels 8 – 10
Compatible with OSRIC and Most OSR Rulesets

LONG AGO, A CATACLYSMIC EVENT RIPPED APART THE WORLD OF TERRANS.
A FERTILE LANDSACPE WAS TRANSFORMED, OVERNIGHT, INTO THE BARREN, PARCHED DESERT. NO ONE ALIVE CAN SAY WHAT CAUSED THIS DISASTER, BUT THE SAGE ASCHUTIS SEEKS THE TRUTH BEHIND THE RUMOURS.
HE BELIEVES THAT THIS TRUTH LIES…BENEATH BERNHOLD!

Greetings adventurers and Game Masters!

I am pleased to announce the release of the ninth adventure in my Old School Series, BENEATH BEHRNHOLD! This challenging scenario is intended for 4 to 6 veteran adventurers of levels 8 to 10. In this module your players will find themselves in the village of Vindobo, which lies in the southern portion of the Imperium province of Aquila. There they will meet the sage Aschutis Vaso, who seeks to employ them to investigate the ruins of ancient Bernhold keep, looking for information to aid his research; and to rescue a group of young, neophyte adventurers he previously sent to complete the task…and who were never heard from again.

Synopsis: Hidden in a wooded vale lie the remains of Bernhold Keep. Beneath this ancient fastness dwell the spirits of its original inhabitants, betrayers who turned away from the Light and embraced Chaos in a climactic battle that rent this land asunder. Cursed to everlasting unlife, they wait below, ready to claim the lives of all those foolish enough to venture into their demesne.

Are you brave enough to delve Beneath Bernhold?
boardgame.rpg: Old School Reference and Index Compilation (OSRIC)

boardgame.name: New York City
boardgame.description:
Build sky scrapers and develop transport in the city that never sleeps.

A game of New York City is played over 5 game rounds. First, players deal out cards in sets of two cards equal to two times the number of players plus one additional. In turn order, players draft a pair of cards until they have 4 cards. Then, they draw 3 more cards from the deck.

Next comes the bidding round, where in turn order players will play cards to bid to determine the strength of their action, with the player who bids the highest getting a bonus. In order, the actions are:


Press: Advance on the Press track to determine player and tie-breaking order.
Money: Receive money to be used for special actions.
Characters: Take a character with a special ability or scoring up to the value of cards played.
Building plans: Take a number of skyscrapers from the general supply.
Prestige: Receive points equal to your bidding value. I addition, the first and second place bidder gets to increase the value of a borough.
Skyscrapers: Players place skyscrapers from their board into borough currently being visited by the mayor.


The game is played over six rounds (one for each borough). Each game, the value of boroughs is randomly assigned, and the player with the most skyscrapers in a a borough receives full value, and the next player receiving half, and so on. There is also a borough for building in every borough. Points are also awarded for certain characters, and the player with the most points is the winner.

Based on Rialto, a previously designed game by Stefan Feld.

boardgame.name: Dystopia Rising: LARP Evolution
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The world ended, in all the ways you’d expect. People died. People killed. People suffered. People lost. It’s been a very, very long time since then. When you’ve seen the worst humanity has to offer, it’s going to be hard to trust again for a while, maybe decades, maybe centuries. When you don’t know what tomorrow brings, it’s hard to hope. But hope is a persistent thing. The world ended, but that’s not the point. Now, you stand with the other survivors generations after the fall, and you say, “We can be something different. Something better.”

Welcome to Dystopia Rising: Evolved, the ruleset 10 years in the making for the Dystopia Rising Larp Network.

boardgame.name: The AMC-222 Report
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

"This is a good one.

"Asteroid Mining Catch 222 in the Peller System has sent out an emergency request for assistance. They have two members of staff deceased, probably murdered, and another member missing. After the station started a new mining shaft two workers were found mutilated in the mine and there appears to be foul play in the disappearance of the third. I’ve attached what we know to this message but these deep space mining facilities don’t have the best hypercom transmitters so the data package was quite small. Anyway, there should be enough information to give you an idea of what’s going on."

The AMC-222 Report is an official adventure for Those Dark Places.

boardgame.name: Incident Eskerbay Bog
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

SOMETHING IS TAKING THE CHILDREN

None of the villagers of Eskerbay are saying out loud, but the mere thought of the dissapearances sits heavy over the atmosphere. This case file contains the report of Agent Walker of the supernatural investigative agency L.A.N.C.E. and his findings when sent to investigate a series of dissapearances in the sleepy Irish village of Eskerbay. Included within is background and information about the mysterious happenings in Eskerbay, direction on how to turn the tale into a story for your players as well as profiles and in game rules for playing the story in the SHIVER RPG.

boardgame.name: Giggles the Clown
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

WONNA HEAR A JOKE?

Explore the creepy occurences related to the anomaly termed 'Giggles', a murderous clown with a secretive nature. This case file contains information on previous dissapearacnes, eye witness reports and desciprtions of 'Giggles' previous lairs including the abandoned carnival 'Funzoland' and the circus railway graveyard. This case file also includes a profile and rules for playing Giggles in the SHIVER RPG.

boardgame.name: The Woodsman
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

IF YOU GO DOWN TO THE WOODS TODAY, YOU'RE IN FOR A BIG SURPRISE

Explore the mythos behind The Woodsman, a supernatural slasher who defends the woods from the incroach of mankinds influence. This case file features background information about sightings and dissapearances and all the loe you could need to bring The Woodsman to life in your own tales. It also includes a profile and rules for playing The Woordsman in the SHIVER RPG.

boardgame.name: The Cursed Library
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Cursed Library

A Military operation discovers horrors aboard a lost ship in the Arctic circle.

A group of 1980's kids explore a haunted house on Halloween night.

A Wild West posse investigates mysterious disappearances at a mountain mine.

A crew answers a distress signal in the uncharted depths of deep space, only to find more than just survivors.

Broken down with no way home, a group search for help at an old farmhouse through the cornfields.

The Cursed Library collects these five tales of horror across the ages to be used with the SHIVER tabletop role-playing game.

boardgame.name: The Book of Random Tables 5
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Cut down your game master and dungeon master prep time with 25 D100 fantasy random tables

Find random tables like Dragon Names, Fantasy Country Names, Ship Names, Carousing, Night Encounters, Fey-Touched Carnival Prizes, Items in a Fishing Boat, Items in a Goblin Den, Business Profit & Loss, Key Backstory Moments, NPC Developments, Resurrection Side Effects, Town Happenings, and more.

boardgame.name: The Isle d' Joc Atlas & Adventure
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A sparsely inhabited island known for plague with a falcon garrison and naval base on a smaller offshore island. While offically conquered and now part of the Falcon Empire. No falcon soldier has set foot on the island proper. The locals want to keepit that way.In fact theywould like to get rid of the falcon empire completely. They may turn to the player characters for help.
boardgame.rpg: Planet Archipelago: A Medieval Science Fiction Role-Play Game

boardgame.name: The Spider-God's Bride (5E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Webs of Intrigue

The mission is simple: Escort a Lamuran lord and his entourage on a visit to the city of Zul-Bazzir. The road to Zul-Bazzir is perilous, but it is after arrival that things truly take a turn for the worse! Can you avoid getting entangled in the webs of intrigue spun by the cult of the Spider-God?

Savage Swords and Sinister Sorcery

"The Spider-God's Bride" is a stand-alone sword and sorcery adventure module, inspired by the pulp era tales of Robert E. Howard and Clark Ashton Smith. Venture in the footsteps of Conan the Cimmerian, Satampra Zeiros of Uzuldaroum, Imaro of Nyumbani, and other fabled thieves, reavers and slayers!

Written for the Fifth Edition (5E) of the world's most popular roleplaying game, the adventure in this book can be easily adapted to any fantasy roleplaying game ruleset or edition.

Note: This standalone adventure was originally published as part of the collection "The Spider-God's Bride and Other Tales of Sword and Sorcery". This new version has been updated to fifth edition rules and includes new maps and artwork.

Book features:

A fully detailed sword and sorcery adventure for character levels 2-3
Use as a stand-alone module for an evening or two of play, or use the background information as the basis for several adventures
A mix of mystery, roleplaying, skulduggery, wilderness and city exploration, and deadly combat -- a chance for every character class to shine!
City and dungeon maps
New monsters and NPCs
New magic items

boardgame.name: ドワーフのネックレス工房 (Dowa-fu no Nekkuresu Koubou)
boardgame.description:
ドワーフのネックレス工房 (Dowa-fu no Nekkuresu Koubou) can be translated to "The Dwarf Necklace Workshop".

There’s always a commotion at the Necklace Workshop where thirteen dwarves work as skilled craftsmen. Even though it’s critical that tasks be carried out in a timely manner, the sleepyhead dwarves never rush to get things done. As the proprietress of the workshop, you need to manage the dwarves’ various abilities in order to produce a beautiful necklace.

At the beginning of each round, the starting player (who holds the hearth card) selects one dwarf card from the two in their hand and places it so the card is visible to all other players. The remaining players then chose which card they will play from their hand. These cards should be revealed at the same time.

After the cards have been revealed, the player with the dwarf card of the lowest number gets to go first.

On their turn, players execute the abilities written on their dwarf card in order from top to bottom in order to build a necklace. After all abilities are executed, the player picks any card from the upper row of cards placed in the middle of the table and adds this card to his or her hand. If there are any jewels on this card, the player also receives them. Then, the player disposes their previously used card into the lower row.  

This ends the player’s turn and the next player now starts his or her turn until all players have carried out one turn each.

  At the end of the round, one jewel is drawn randomly from the jewel bag and placed onto any card remaining the the upper row in the middle of the table. Then, all cards in the lower round are moved into the upper row so that the row is replenished to a total of 5 cards.

Also at the end the round, the current starting player receives one jewel. 

When a player completes stringing 8+ jewels onto their necklace string (6+ in case of a 3 player game), the game proceeds to the final round. The player with the highest valued necklace at the end of the game is the victor.

boardgame.name: Zakodowany Zamek
boardgame.description:
Zakodowany Zamek (The Castle of Code) is an educational childrens game that will introduce young kids into the programming world of coding. Programming is a language of strings and instructions that one can read to understand the wirtual reality.
The Castle of Code can develop the skills useful for programmers: concentration, patience, persistence and ingenuity. What's more: it is a cooperative game, so it builds social skills. It uses the idea of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Maths).

All players are playing against the ghost and are trying to collect the gems hidden in a castle before the ghost will reach the peak of a tower. Players move the wise magician by the castle, use the hidden portals or a magic wand. The deck of cards is being used to determine the movement. There are cards with arrows, magician and ghost. Arrows show in which direction the magician will move - player may rotate the card to change its direction. The magician card can be used to move in each direction and ghist card will move the ghost up.

At the beginning of the game players draw the 4 gems and place them on the board using the code on the back side of tokens. During each turn a player draw 3 cards, and move the magician or the ghost respectively.

The game ends when magician (players) collect all the four gems, or when the ghost arrive at the top of a tower.

boardgame.name: Bear Stare Down: The Card Game
Beware of bears
boardgame.description:
Beware of Bears is an exciting fast-paced card game where players fight to sabotage and eliminate each other while watching out for... bears! Defeat your friends and make your path to victory before you end up in a bear's stomach!

The more you progress through the game, the crazier it gets with lava, evil squirrels, yummy donuts, and best of all, scary bears! Beware of Bears is a super strategic, family friendly, fast paced, 20-30 minute game that will keep you laughing... and running for your life!

Players draw cards and try to escape the forest. The first one who escapes wins.
boardgame.commerceweblink: Geek Game Shop listing for Bear Stare Down

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter Edition incl. both Expansions ? x1 National Park Expansion Pack ? x1 Scout Expansion Pack ? Upgraded "National Park" Forest Cards ? x6 Limited Edition KSE Bear Action Cards

boardgame.name: Infinity CodeOne: Operation Crimson Stone
boardgame.description:
Operation: Crimson Stone Battle Pack is a box containing 14 miniatures belonging to the two different armies of the Nomads and Ariadna, an introductory ruleset, cardboard scenery, dice — everything you need to start collecting Infinity CodeOne or just to complete your collection!

In addition to this, Operation: Crimson Stone is the official way to introduce yourself to the Infinity CodeOne ruleset, as it includes a full color rulebook with 5 tutorial missions to teach you how to play, making it easy to understand the Infinity CodeOne core mechanics.

In this booklet you will also find the background and troop profiles of all the troops in the Battle Pack. There is also a brief guide to the Infinity universe and advice on exploring it in more detail.

Operation: Crimson Stone contains 2 totally new Starter Packs of two brand new factions: Nomads, a coalition of three colossal ships, and Ariadna, founded by the descendants of the first human colony ship. A total of 14 highly detailed metal miniatures!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Time Vs. Ninja: Series Four
boardgame.description:
Time-Traveling Ninja jump through history, hunting for rare artifacts, meeting unusual companions, exploring hostile lands and engaging in Ninja Battle!

This science-fiction adventure game features an array of maps to explore, from Ancient Egypt to a futuristic Lunar Colony. Players choose from one of the Legendary Ninja characters (each with their own Legendary Ninja Ability, then embark on a time-traveling adventure!

Players roll dice to travel through treacherous zones, hop from zone to zone, or acquire item and companion cards. As they collect, their abilities and options grow!

Each character is linked in a row, so any damage one sustains dramatically impacts the other players. Being connected to your enemies can be a real challenge! If a Ninja 'falls off the row', the game ends and the one with those most collected items wins!

Series 4 includes 4 Time-Spaces:
Ethiopia 2M BC
Hong Kong 1500 AD
North Atlantic 1912 AD
Detriot 2050 AD

Also included are 3 Legendary Ninja:
Jinichi Kawakami
Ukifune Jinnai
Miracle Kazane

boardgame.name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Remake
boardgame.description: Remake

boardgame.name: Infinity Defiance: Megalodron
boardgame.description: The Megalodron expansion adds the massive Megalodron enemy to Infinity Defiance. Included in the box are the Megalodron PVC miniature, 1 Megalodron enemy card, 4 Megalodron initiative cards, and an alternative final mission for the Core set, mission 13.

boardgame.name: Project Eve
boardgame.description: Project Eve is an action-adventure game that takes place in the not-too-distant future on the ruined Earth against unknown enemies.

boardgame.name: Marvel's Wolverine
boardgame.description: Adventure

boardgame.name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2
boardgame.description: Action

boardgame.name: The Day is Ours!: The Battle of Princeton, 1777
boardgame.description:
The Day is Ours! The Battle of Princeton, 1777, simulates this crucial battle of the American Revolutionary War. Following their surprise victory at Trenton, the Americans marched throughout the night to strike at the rear of the British-held city of Princeton. Washington urged his troops on, declaring “The day is ours!”

—description from the publisher
